item.title: Train Dynamic Simulation Program
item.description: Material handling optimisation using Engineering kinematics KMK Consulting Engineers have an in-house software to simulate train dynamic behaviour. This include forces experienced by the positioner arm as well as movement profiles of individual wagons.
